items.title: HYPE nears $60 as Hyperliquid’s upgrades and record fees propel rally amid wedge risk
items.excerpt: HYPE surged to $58.77 following a $57.40 high, testing the $60 psychological level as Hyperliquid’s latest upgrades and record fees stoke momentum. A rising wedge near $59.36 and cooling signals on lower timeframes temper the advance.
